Title: "Language Detection Skill: JSON Built-in Skills and Sample Outputs"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfLanguageDetectionSkill",    "inputs": [      {        "name": "text",        "source": "/document/text"      },      {        "name": "countryHint",        "source": "/document/countryHint"JSON      }    ],    "outputs": [      {        "name": "languageCode",        "targetName": "myLanguageCode"      },      {        "name":
"languageName",        "targetName": "myLanguageName"      },      {        "name": "score",        "targetName": "myLanguageScore"      }    ]  }Sample input{    "values": [      {        "recordId": "1",        "data":           {             "text": "Glaciers are huge rivers of ice that ooze their way over land, powered by gravity and their own sheer weight.
"           }      },      {        "recordId": "2",        "data":           {             "text": "Estamos muy felices de estar con ustedes.
"           }      },      {        "recordId": "3",        "data":           {             "text": "impossible",             "countryHint": "fr"           }      }    ]JSONBuilt-in skillsHow to define a skillsetSample output{    "values": [      {        "recordId": "1",        "data":            {              "languageCode": "en",              "languageName": "English",              "score": 1,            }      },      {        "recordId": "2",        "data": {              "languageCode": "es",              "languageName": "Spanish",              "score": 1,            }      },      {        "recordId": "3",        "data":            {              "languageCode": "fr",              "languageName": "French",              "score": 1,            }      }    ]}See alsoOCR cognitive skillArticle•07/18/2023The Optical character recognition (OCR) skill recognizes printed and handwritten text inimage files.
